items.summary: Ensure the user-provided personal photo renders visibly in the top-of-page placeholder on the Valentine proposal page by fixing the static asset reference and build/deploy asset availability for the file path currently used: /assets/generated/personal-photo.dim_1600x1600.png.

Add robust client-side handling for the personal photo element so that if the image cannot load, the UI does not show a broken/empty placeholder; instead, render a clear fallback state in the photo frame with English text indicating the photo is unavailable.

Audit the Valentine proposal page UI to confirm there is no remaining in-app upload/preview flow, and that the userâ€™s personal photo is only displayed as a fixed static asset at the top of the page.
